sourcesContent:
<template>
  <el-header style="background-color: #f5f7fa;">
    <el-container>
      <!-- 水平菜单作为导航栏 -->
      <el-menu mode="horizontal" background-color="#f5f7fa" text-color="#303133" active-text-color="#409EFF">
        <el-menu-item index="/">
          <router-link to="/">首页</router-link>
        </el-menu-item>
        <el-menu-item index="/about">
          <router-link to="/about">关于我们</router-link>
        </el-menu-item>
        <!-- 更多菜单项... -->
      </el-menu>
    </el-container>
  </el-header>
</template>

<script>
import { ElHeader, ElMenu, ElMenuItem } from 'element-plus';

export default {
  components: {
    ElHeader,
    ElMenu,
    ElMenuItem,
  },
};
</script>
